skills.skill: PCIe, USB, DisplayPort, HDMI, Thunderbolt Specifications
IBIS-AMI, HSPICE, Spectre, AMS, Simplis Transient Analysis

duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the system-level Signal Integrity (SI), analysis and validation aspects of Mac and Accessory products development.
Model physical signaling channel topologies including differential, single ended, and parallel bus types.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Utilize interconnect modeling capabilities using S-Parameter, W-Elements.
Manage the company's online presence, optimizing the website and social media channels for maximum engagement and conversions.
Measure and report on the performance of marketing campaigns, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.
Execute system-level transient analysis using relevant tools.
Execute channel analysis and target impedance analysis.
Lead or support system level Serdes design and analysis.
Debug Desense issues, RF schematic, and PCB layout practice.
Foster collaboration and guiding efforts towards achieving set goals.
Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility and promote freight and logistics services.
Lead a team of marketing specialists, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving set goals.
Plan and oversee participation in industry events, conferences, and trade shows to showcase services and network with potential clients.

education_certification.credential: Masters or PhD with at least 3~4 years of industry experience in Signal Integrity Engineering.
